name: temp_begins_01
text: Well that's it. The secret is out!

name: temp_first_01
text: First blood! There's nothing more mysterious until it has been spilled.

text: My blades and my mind are as one.

name: temp_kill_01
text: You came too close to the secrets.
text_simple: you came too close to the secrets

name: temp_kill_02
text: The temple cannot protect itself. That's why I'm here.
text_simple: the temple cannot protect itself thats why im here

name: temp_kill_04
text: You never could keep a secret.
text_simple: you never could keep a secret

name: temp_kill_05
text: Your death was a secret I can no longer hide.
text_simple: your death was a secret i can no longer hide

name: temp_kill_06
text: You died on the temple steps, had you but eyes to see it.
text_simple: you died on the temple steps had you but eyes to see it

name: temp_kill_07
text: The truth is all around you but it hides from the unworthy.
text_simple: the truth is all around you but it hides from the unworthy

name: temp_kill_09
text: For heresies unknown, the Temple decreed your death.
text_simple: for heresies unknown the temple decreed your death

name: temp_kill_10
text: I saw that ending from miles away.
text_simple: i saw that ending from miles away

name: temp_rival_01
text: Riki, it's no secret that you're a poor assassin.
text_simple: riki its no secret that youre a poor assassin

name: temp_rival_02
text: Your failure was no mystery to me, Bounty Hunter.
text_simple: your failure was no mystery to me bounty hunter

name: temp_rival_03
text: Phantom, I was not a fan.
text_simple: phantom i was not a fan

name: temp_rival_04
text: Warlock, your soul is an open book with moldy pages.
text_simple: warlock your soul is an open book with moldy pages

name: temp_rival_05
text: Warlock, you were so easy to read.
text_simple: warlock you were so easy to read

name: temp_rival_06
text: I believe, Invoker, you must have come too close to the mysteries.
text_simple: i believe invoker you must have come too close to the mysteries

name: temp_rival_07
text: You almost had our secrets, so we could not let you live.
text_simple: you almost had our secrets so we could not let you live

name: temp_rival_08
text: Omniknight, your continual braying had to be silenced.
text_simple: omniknight your continual braying had to be silenced

name: temp_rival_09
text: Next time, keep your Omniscience to yourself.
text_simple: next time keep your omniscience to yourself

name: temp_rival_10
text: I'm not that sort of templar, knight.
text_simple: im not that sort of templar knight

name: temp_rival_11
text: The only mystery is how you lasted so long.
text_simple: the only mystery is how you lasted so long

name: temp_rival_12
text: Oh, Spectre, we could have shared such secrets.
text_simple: oh spectre we could have shared such secrets

name: temp_rival_13
text: I thought you spoke of mysteries but I see you were only confused.
text_simple: i thought you spoke of mysteries but i see you were only confused

name: temp_ally_01
text: Ah, Riki, care to share some trade secrets?
text_simple: ah riki care to share some trade secrets
pretty_criteria: Riki is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: temp_ally_02
text: Phantom Assassin, you're not here for me are you?
text_simple: phantom assassin youre not here for me are you
pretty_criteria: Phantom Assassin is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: temp_ally_03
text: If you ever tire of serving Nyx, the Hidden Ones would have you.
text_simple: if you ever tire of serving nyx the hidden ones would have you
pretty_criteria: Nyx Assassin is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: temp_ally_04
text: Warlock, I trust none of my secrets will end up in your grimoire?
text_simple: warlock i trust none of my secrets will end up in your grimoire
pretty_criteria: Warlock is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: temp_ally_05
text: You are one of the few who understand the value of Silence.
text_simple: you are one of the few who understand the value of silence

name: temp_ally_06
text: Your temple is not mine, Omniknight, but the Hidden Ones instruct me to cooperate.

pretty_criteria: Omniknight is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: temp_lasthit_04
text: What would you have done with that.
text_simple: what would you have done with that

name: temp_lasthit_08
text: I'll put in a good word for you.
text_simple: ill put in a good word for you

name: temp_death_06
text: I can't hide anything from you.
text_simple: i cant hide anything from you

name: temp_respawn_01
text: A glimpse of the secrets and already they fade.
text_simple: a glimpse of the secrets and already they fade

name: temp_respawn_02
text: I must prove myself in battle to be worthy of the Hidden Ones.
text_simple: i must prove myself in battle to be worthy of the hidden ones

name: temp_respawn_03
text: For death I was unready, so the temple cast me out.
text_simple: for death i was unready so the temple cast me out

name: temp_respawn_04
text: This time I'll be a bit more guarded.
text_simple: this time ill be a bit more guarded

name: temp_respawn_05
text: I would prefer to keep my whereabouts a mystery.
text_simple: i would prefer to keep my whereabouts a mystery

name: temp_respawn_06
text: By my honor that will not happen again.
text_simple: by my honor that will not happen again

name: temp_respawn_07
text: I'll renew my vows if I must, but keep me in your service, Hidden Ones.
text_simple: ill renew my vows if i must but keep me in your service hidden ones

name: temp_respawn_08
text: I have nothing else to offer but my life.
text_simple: i have nothing else to offer but my life

name: temp_respawn_09
text: Please accept my deep regrets. I'll not fail you again.
text_simple: please accept my deep regrets ill not fail you again

name: temp_respawn_10
text: Let's keep that between us, all right?
text_simple: lets keep that between us all right

name: temp_rare_01
text: Where the Hidden Ones send me, I go without question. I do not even question why I question not.
text_simple: where the hidden ones send me i go without question i do not even question why i question not

name: temp_rare_02
text: My body is a temple for which I will kill.
text_simple: my body is a temple for which i will kill

name: temp_rare_03
text: Where mind meets matter, those are the temple steps from which the mysteries may be glimpsed.
text_simple: where mind meets matter those are the temple steps from which the mysteries may be glimpsed

name: temp_rare_04
text: I did not take power nor did I earn it. It came with my vows. And if I were to break them, there would be nothing left.
text_simple: i did not take power nor did i earn it it came with my vows and if i were to break them there would be nothing left

name: temp_bottle_03
text: In a hidden place with you.
text_simple: in a hidden place with you

name: temp_deny_12
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

text: The Hidden Ones have blessed me.

text: It's no secret- I was hoping for one of these.

name: temp_thanks_04
text: I'll thank you to keep this a secret between us.

text: It's an open secret, obvious to all, that this one is in the bag!
